page.title: 07Employment in Pontefract.
page.content: Pontefract is an old market town which has been granted charters to hold fairs and markets since 1181.Weaving and cloth making was a speciality. Pontefract is famous for its confectionary.Pomfret cakes which are small,flat pieces of liquorice,are known throughout the World.However, liquorice has not been grown for many years and only two of the original fifteen factories remain. The whole nature of the town changed 100 years ago when the Prince of Wales Colliery was establisted in Tanshelf. The Colliery produces nearly one million tonnes of coal each year,but there is a loss of Â£7 per tonne produced. Coal output was increased five years ago with the opening of a drift mine,while an outcrop of coal is being excavated from fields adjoining the Colliery.
